Inc.","details":"Rule 701 allows private companies to issue compensatory securities without SEC registration      This facet lives on the company wallet because:      - Rule 701 is an issuer-level regulation      - Must aggregate across ALL equity classes and ALL compensation plans      - Company metrics (total assets) naturally belong on the company wallet      12-Month Rolling Limit (greater of):      - $1,000,000      - 15% of total assets      - 15% of outstanding securities of the class being granted","errors":{"AccessControl_CallerIsNotAuthorized(address,bytes4)":[{"params":{"caller":"Address attempting the call","functionSig":"Function selector that was params.planAddress: Address of the option/RSU plan token

returns.aggregateValue: Total value of grants in past 12 months

returns.grants: Array of grants in the period

returns.capacity: Amount that can still be granted

returns.limit: 15% of outstanding securities value for that class

returns.required: True if disclosure documents must be provided

packedSelectors().details: Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)

registerGrant(address,uint256,uint256,st.details: Only callable by authorized plan tokensReverts if grant would exceed limit

params.tokenAddress: The equity token to be granted

returns.allowed: True if grant would be allowed
returns.remainingCapacity: Amount that can still be granted

PERCENTAGE_LIMIT_BPS().notice: Percentage limit for assets/securities (15% = 1500 basis points)

authorizePlan(address).notice: Authorize a plan token to register grants

get12MonthAggregateValue().notice: Get aggregate grant value in trailing 12 months

getDisclosureStatus().notice: Check if disclosure has been provided

getGrantStatsByType(string).notice: Get grant count and value by type in trailing 12 months

getGrantsInPeriod().notice: Get all grants in the trailing 12-month period

getRemainingCapacity().notice: Get remaining capacity under current limit

getSecuritiesLimitForToken(address).notice: Get 15% limit for a specific equity token class

isPlanAuthorized(address).notice: Check if a plan is authorized

packedSelectors().notice: Returns all function selectors for this facet as tightly packed bytes

registerEquityToken(address,string).notice: Register an equity token for 15% calculation

registerGrant(address,uint256,uint256,st.notice: Register a grant for Rule 701 tracking

updateCompanyMetrics(uint256,bytes32).notice: Update company metrics for limit calculation

validateGrant(address,uint256).notice: Check if a proposed grant would be within limits (dry run)
